projects.title: Digitel Pro - Blending Your Education
projects.description: The project is in collaboration with other EU universities to deliver a course on Blended Learning and a research report. The course designed by TU Delft is about how to design and develop blended education and teaching (a deliberate combination of online and offline learning activities). Based on what we've learned from COVID Teaching and in the EMBED project you will apply concepts to adapt to a more inclusive and engaging blended learning experience, through guidelines and pedagogies leading to mature and high-quality education.

profile_positions.title: Learning Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Instructional Designer for Teacher and Social and Emotional Learning (SEL)  MOOC Specialization
•	Instructionally designed educational material to enable senior businessmen in Asia to learn English and compete with younger industry peers. 
•	Utilized expertise to create/release a membership site from instructional design, to development, to implementation. 
•	Applied skills to launch a new product of Weekly Menus. Designed templates for all levels of the diet.
•	Demonstrated abilities as a Social Media Content Manager for company with over 65,000 Facebook fans through use of social media content calendar and successful dissemination of news. Grew a small medical research company's social media followers from 15,000 to over 65,000 and the newsletter from 15,000 to over 55,000. Through campaigns, promoted new products and called for funding and met grant needs for additional research study. 
•	Guided book launch to bring a client’s book listing to #3 in her field on Amazon. Directed website migration project to release shortly before the book launch. Directed strategic media relations and all aspects of project management involving branding, social media, website management, membership site, customer service, and marketing.

profile_positions.title: Blended Learning Developer (Teaching and Learning with Technology Consultant at ALTEC)
Blended Learning Developer (Foreign Language Technology Specialist at ALTEC)

profile_positions.description:
•	Exemplified skills to find/secure a grant to develop the first Spanish 1010 (first semester Spanish) online course at UC Denver. Project provided additional funding for the instructional designer, developer, and SME. Planning and development took 1 month to release grant compliant and peer reviewed course in Canvas.
•	Used abilities as an educator to teach online course for 1 year in the Masters program. Position ended upon graduation.
profile_positions.title: Spanish Graduate Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Course focused on teaching and applying SMART goals for learners to pursue achievable career and college study paths

•	Collaborated with colleagues to work on a grant from the state to design and implement a game-based learning environment. 
•	Applied skills as a team player to plan the course concept. Took the ideas and instructionally designed the course as a game. The project took about 6 months to complete to be grant compliant.
•	Utilized abilities to teach the online course AAA 109 – Advanced Academic Achievement in D2L. The course focused on acclimating students to college and career searches. Successful students discovered their career interests, developed their resumes, and explored their degree options.
profile_positions.title: Adjunct Faculty - Advanced Academic Achievement

Managed department Listserv
Crisis/outages communications management both internally and externally through the System Status Page
Assisted with department events
Trained staff to assist with website migration roll-out campus wide and maintaining campus guidelines
Oversaw Prospective Student Contacts (Leads)

•	Basic Academic Technical Support and course & enrollment management and course copies for Blackboard and eCollege
